caption.p: Codetection of adenine, guanine, and cytosine using the modified scalene waveform. Representative cyclic voltammograms of (A) nucleosides and (B) nucleotides with a ratio of 1 cytosine to 20 purine bases (adenine and guanine) and the corresponding color plots for (C) nucleosides and (D) nucleotides. 10-bp synthetic poly-AAT (5′-AATAATAATAATAA-3′), poly-GGT (5′-GGTGGTGGTGGTGG-3′), and poly-CCT (5′-CCTCCTCCTCCTCC-3′) were used. (E) 150/400 scalene waveform, which ramps up from −0.4 to 1.45 V at 150 V/s and ramps down at 400 V/s.
